title: AIIMS Raebareli Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Assistant Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Raebareli (AIIMS Raebareli) has announced the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for  Junior Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. and M.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Raebareli Recruitment 2026 . Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. Here mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and ...
